Ancestry-Dwarf -- Male Strong-Blooded Dwarf Fighter
Strength: 14 (+2) Dexterity: 12 (+1) Constitution: 12 (+1) Intelligence: 14 (+2) Wisdom: 16 (+3) Charisma: 10 (+0)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Pharasma (N)
Experience: 874/1000 Level: 1 Speed: 20 Size: Medium
Ability Notes:
Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Slow: -5 Speed
Unburdened Iron: Suffers no Speed penalty from armor
Rock Runner: May move normally over stone and earth difficult terrain
Unburdened Iron: Reduces non-armor Speed penalties by 5'

Fighter Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics; Choose 5 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Rock Runner: Does not suffer flat-footed when using Acrobatics to Balance on stone and earth; successes to do so are critical successes
Stonecunning: +2 Perception (unusual stonework)/Gains an automatic -2 check to note unusual stonework
Stonewalker: May find unusual stonework that requires legendary Perception
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 22 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 15 (strength; trained)
Armor: Breastplate Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Battle Axe (+7 1d8+2 S; strength; expert); Clan Dagger (+7 1d4+2 P/B; strength; expert); Javelin (+6 1d6+2 P R30'; dexterity; expert); Spear (+7 1d6+2 P R20'; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dwarven Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Battle Axe; Pick; Warhammer; Dwarf Weapons)
Dwarven Weapon Familiarity: Attack Trained (Battle Axe; Pick; Warhammer)/Treats dwarf weapons as one category simpler
Mountain's Stoutness: +1 Hit Points
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Attack Of Opportunity: (R) May make a melee Strike on foe that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Boulder Roll: (2) May Step into a foe's square to force a 5' move (Fort vs. Athletics critical success neg; normal success neg but inflicts 3B HP)
Dwarven Weapon Cunning: Critical hits with a battle axe, pick, warhammer, or dwarf weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Dwarven Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon dwarf weapons
Mountain's Stoutness: -1 dying recovery DC
Point-Blank Shot: (1) Stance negates volley penalty from a ranged volley weapon and gives +2 attack at close range with a ranged non-volley weapon
Rock Dwarf: +2 DC vs. Shove, Trip, and magical knock prone/Suffers half any forced move distance of 10' or more
Shield Block: (R) When shield is raised, may negate damage up to its hardness and have it absorb half of remaining damage
Vengeful Hatred: +1 per die weapon damage vs. ancestral foes and for 1 min on any foe that inflicts a critical success on attack
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +6 (dexterity; expert); Will: +6 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Call On Ancient Blood: (R) May gain +1 vs. magic until the end of turn
Death Warden Dwarf: Successful saves vs. necromancy effects are critical successes
Forge Dwarf: Has fire resistance 1/Treats environmental heat as 1 step less extreme
Strong-Blooded Dwarf: Has poison resistance 1/Successful saves vs. poison reduce stage by 2 (virulent 1); critical successes by 3 (virulent 2)
Magic
Spells: Meld Into Stone
Magic Notes: Stonewalker: May cast Meld Into Stone 1/day
